abstract.t: This document defines a content sharing usage for REsource LOcation And Discovery (RELOAD). The content sharing usage provides the functionality of distributing and fetching shared content to and from a P2P overlay network. The shared content including such as streaming media, files etc. are provided by those shared content service providers. Using content sharing usage of RELOAD can construct a peer-to-peer overlay, the overlay performs as Content Delivery Network and is service insensitive.
